Topic.Title: How can you make old sections and passages look different from the current section?

Posts.EditableText: Are there any good ways to make old sections and passages look different from the current section? For example, every time you open a new section, can you change the old text to another color? I am looking for a way to show clearly where the new section begins (without having to clear the screen).
Posts.HTML: Are there any good ways to make old sections and passages look different from the current section? For example, every time you open a new section, can you change the old text to another color? I am looking for a way to show clearly where the new section begins (without having to clear the screen).
